adDetails: I specialize in providing high-quality, professional-grade editing and polishing services for technical publications, articles, company reports and startup business plans. My task is to fine-tune your manuscript to make it as clear and concise as possible and I understand that every detail is crucial to the mission. I have a scientific background and a great deal of editing experience. My fields of Interest include: Google Analytics, Data Mining, Power Searching Artificial Intelligence, Singularity, Quantum Computing, Superstring Theory Biotechnology, Increased Human Longevity, Global Warming, Asteroid Threats Contact me to discuss rates and deadlines. Payment is via Paypal or cashiers check.. Send an E-mail to me at show contact info with you preferred time for a call to discuss your project. All communications will be kept confidential.
